name: kirocord
description: Highly customizable Discord Rich Presence extension for Kiro IDE

commands.title: Enable Discord Presence in the current workspace
Disable Discord Presence in the current workspace

kirocord.app.name.description:
Choose the name you want the application to use.
Choosing "Custom" will make it so it use the "rpc.id" as application id

kirocord.app.id.description: Application id that will be used when `appName` is "Custom" or when `appName` is invalid

kirocord.app.privacyMode.enable.description: Should we hide the github repository, the file name and the workspace name?

kirocord.app.whitelistIsBlacklist.description: Switches the whitelist to a blacklist.

kirocord.app.whitelist.description: List of discord user ids that will be able to use the extension.

kirocord.status.resetElapsedTimePerFile.description: Should we reset the elapsed time after switching file?

kirocord.status.problems.text.description: This text will be shown when there is a problem.

kirocord.status.problems.countedSeveriti.description: List of problem level to count for `problems_count`.

kirocord.status.idle.check.description: Should we check when you are idling?

kirocord.status.idle.enabled.description:
Should we enable the idle status? 
If disabled, the extension will only show a plain card with Kiro logo when idling.

kirocord.status.idle.disconnectOnIdle.description:
Should going idle disconnect you from Discord gateway? 
If enabled, Kiro activity card will disappear from Discord at all when idling.

kirocord.status.idle.resetElapsedTime.description: Should going idle reset the elapsed time on the last active file? Only applies if "Disconnect on Idle" is enabled.

kirocord.status.idle.timeout.description: Time in seconds before the user is considered idle.

kirocord.ignore.workspaces.description: A list of workspace (name / path) to ignore.

kirocord.ignore.workspacesText.description: The text / object to show in the status when current workspace is ignored, when using the object, key is workspace name and value is the text.

kirocord.ignore.repositories.description: A list of repository name to ignore.

kirocord.ignore.organizations.description: A list of git organizations to ignore.

kirocord.ignore.gitHosts.description: A list of git host to ignore.

kirocord.status.details.idle.enabled.description: Should details be shown when idling?

kirocord.status.details.text.idle.description: The text to show when idling.

kirocord.status.details.text.editing.description: The text to show when editing a file.

kirocord.status.details.text.debugging.description: The text to show when debugging.

kirocord.status.details.text.viewing.description: The text to show when viewing a file.

kirocord.status.details.text.notInFile.description: The text to show when you are not in a file.

kirocord.status.details.text.noWorkSpace.description: The text to show when you are not in a workspace and there is no workspace text.

kirocord.status.state.debugging.enabled.description: Should state be shown when debugging? If disabled, it will be shown when editing/viewing a file.

kirocord.status.state.idle.enabled.description: Should state be shown when idling?

kirocord.status.state.text.idle.description: The text to show when idling.

kirocord.status.state.text.editing.description: The text to show when editing a file.

kirocord.status.state.text.debugging.description: The text to show when debugging.

kirocord.status.state.text.viewing.description: The text to show when viewing a file.

kirocord.status.state.text.notInFile.description: The text to show when you are not in a file.

kirocord.status.state.text.noWorkspaceFo.description: The text to show when no workspace is found.

kirocord.status.image.large.idle.key.description: The image url to use when idling

kirocord.status.image.large.idle.text.description: The large text to show when idling.

kirocord.status.image.large.viewing.key.description: The image url to use when viewing a file.

kirocord.status.image.large.viewing.text.description: The large text to show when viewing a file.

kirocord.status.image.large.editing.key.description: The image url to use when editing a file.

kirocord.status.image.large.editing.text.description: The large text to show when editing a file.

kirocord.status.image.large.debugging.ke.description: The image url to use when debugging.

kirocord.status.image.large.debugging.te.description: The large text to show when debugging

kirocord.status.image.large.notInFile.ke.description: The image url to use when you are not in a file.

kirocord.status.image.large.notInFile.te.description: The large text to show when you are not in a file.

kirocord.status.image.small.idle.key.description: The image url to use when idling.

kirocord.status.image.small.idle.text.description: The small text to show when idling.

kirocord.status.image.small.viewing.key.description: The image url to use when viewing a file.

kirocord.status.image.small.viewing.text.description: The small text to show when viewing a file.

kirocord.status.image.small.editing.key.description: The image url to use when editing a file.

kirocord.status.image.small.editing.text.description: The small text to show when editing a file.

kirocord.status.image.small.debugging.ke.description: The image url to use when debugging.

kirocord.status.image.small.debugging.te.description: The small text to show when debugging.

kirocord.status.image.small.notInFile.ke.description: The image url to use when you are not in a file.

kirocord.status.image.small.notInFile.te.description: The small text to show when you are not in a file.

kirocord.file.size.round.description: The number of decimal places to round the file size to.

kirocord.file.size.spacer.description: Spacer between the number and the unit.

kirocord.behaviour.additionalFileMapping.description: Additional regex to check for language, key is regex and value is the language.

kirocord.behaviour.suppressNotifications.description: Suppresses all notifications from the extension.

kirocord.behaviour.prioritizeLanguagesOv.description: Prioritize language defined by editor over file extension when determining the language for the file.

kirocord.behaviour.statusBarAlignment.description: Changing the alignment of the status bar.

kirocord.file.size.humanReadable.description: If true, the file size will be displayed in a human readable format (e.g. 1.2 MB). If false, the file size will be displayed in bytes.

kirocord.file.size.standard.description: The unit standard to use when displaying the file size.

virtualWorkspaces.description: Cannot access local Discord RPC when running in virtual workspace
